item.title: Health Minister David Clark moved house during level 4 lockdown, says he didn't flout the rules
item.description:
Health Minister David Clark reportedly moved house while the rest of the country was on lockdown, but says he didn't breach the rules for the third time.
Clark was spotted repeatedly between two Dunedin ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

item.title: The data showing the success of NZ's lockdown over Australia's
item.description:
